info.name: AsyncImage Fetcher API
info.description: A Postman collection for the AsyncImage Fetcher API. This collection contains example requests for downloading images and retrieving them by name.

item.name: Download Multiple Images
item.description: Submits a list of image URLs for concurrent download. The `maxDownloadAtOnce` field controls how many images are downloaded in parallel. The response will include a dictionary mapping each original URL to its new unique filename or an error message.

item.name: Get Image by Name
item.description:
Retrieves a previously downloaded image by its unique name, which is returned from the download endpoint. 

Replace the `:imageName` path variable with the actual filename you want to retrieve.

The response will contain the Base64-encoded string of the image.

variable.description: The unique name of the image you want to retrieve.
